title: Affidavit for Compliance Certifications
additional_documentation_required: Certification of Registration with State Department of Assessments and Taxation
bid_summary: This document outlines required affirmations and certifications for businesses contracting with the State of Maryland or its agencies. It covers legal authority, state registration and good standing, financial disclosure obligations for contracts exceeding $100,000, political contribution disclosure for contracts over $200,000, and mandatory drug and alcohol-free workplace policies. Compliance with these affirmations is a condition for contract award and continued performance, with potential penalties for non-compliance.
